Detailed Description

The Objective base class and derived classes.

The Objective is the problem that Zoltan2 has to solve. It has an ObjectSource which is a graph, matrix, or geometry. It may have vertex and/or edge weights. It may have constraints such as fixed vertices. (TODO: Should we create a Constraints class to represent constraints like this?) It could also have a Result to refine rather than starting from scratch.

A PartitioningObjective specifies number of parts and part sizes. A ColoringObjective specifies (TODO). An OrderingObjective specifies (TODO). A FineGrainMatrixObjective specifies (TODO).
